title: TRIGGER_REF (Struct)
text:
TYPE TRIGGER_REF : STRUCT
This structure describes a trigger input for
MC_TouchProbe
.
The axis driver decides how the trigger number is mapped
to hardware triggers.

rows.Name: iTriggerNumber
rows.Comment:
Trigger channel, defined by driver.
Must be in the range [0,SMC_MAX_NUM_TRIGGERS-1].
Only used ifbFastLatchingisTRUE.
Please check the driver documentation inside the driver library or in the
online help for details on the used driver.

rows.Name: bFastLatching
rows.Comment: TRUE: Latching is done in drive (precise).FALSE: Latching is done withbInputin the cycle of the motion task (unprecise).
